name: Pacbase: Avoid Online Programs (including macros) with High Fan-out
description: Avoid Programs with High Fan-Out (Fan-Out > 30). `!xA!`The Total Fan-out is the number of CALL staements in the Program and the included Macros.The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.`!xA!`Total Fan-out measures the Fan-out of the Program/TP INCLUDING its Macros.
output: Nb of online programs with fan-out > X including its macros`!xA!`Value: fan-out
rationale: The higher the number of referenced Artifacts, the more difficult the maintenance and evolution as all updates in referenced Artifacts will have to be tested and taken into account.
